title: How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2
author: yett
aiHeadline: Who knew a 20-year-old GTA San Andreas glitch would be the highlight of Windows 11's latest update? Tech progress at its finest!

title: You wouldn't steal a font
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: You wouldn't steal a font, would you? Because that's basically the digital equivalent of stealing a Picasso, but with less drama.

title: AI Horseless Carriages

aiHeadline: AI horseless carriages: Because who needs horses when you can have self-driving carriages powered by AI? Progress, baby!

title: Open Source Projects Receive Funding to Reclaim the Public Internet
author: edent
aiHeadline: Open source projects receive funding to reclaim the public internet: Finally, someone's fighting the good fight against corporate overlords taking over our digital lives.
